entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Parrsboro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parrsboro 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 9.4°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 18 except 12 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog retreating to the coast. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 18 except 12 in onshore winds. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening and ending overnight. Fog patches this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
